structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Legal effects of creation of city-county authority.

text.section: The creation of a city-county housing authority shall be subject to the same provisions and limitations of KRS 80.320 to 80.610 as are applicable to a regional housing authority.
The area of operation of a city-county housing authority shall include all of the territory within the boundaries of the city and contiguous county joining in the creation of the authority.

law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 17, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 44, sec. 3.
